org.eclipse.scada.configuration.modbus

Interface ModbusSlave

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModbusSlaveImpl

    public interface ModbusSlave
    A representation of the model object 'Slave'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Blocks
    • Unit Address
    • Id

    See Also:
    ModbusPackage.getModbusSlave()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      getBlocks()
      Returns the value of the 'Blocks' containment reference list.

      Returns the value of the 'Id' attribute.

      Sets the value of the 'Id' attribute.

      Sets the value of the 'Unit Address' attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlocks

         getBlocks()
        Returns the value of the 'Blocks' containment reference list. The list contents are of type ModbusBlock.

        If the meaning of the 'Blocks' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
